reasoning:
**Strategic Poker Thoughts - Round 5**

Okay, here we are in Ante 2/8, Round 5, big blind completed. Let's see... currently sitting on $13. In the SHOP step, got a good selection today. My hand currently has a Full House at Level 1, needing more plays. I have six Jokers, a pretty solid setup. The most relevant are: Smiley Face (+5 Mult for face cards), Mystic Summit (+15 Mult at 0 discards), Spare Trousers (+2 Mult for Two Pair/Full House), Luchador (Polychrome, x1.5 Mult, Boss Blind disable), Constellation (Negative, x1.1 Mult, scales with Planets), and Certificate (Adds card with seal). I also have one Earth consumable, which will level up the Full House and improve Constellation. The Earth card, specifically, seems ideal for this situation.

Right now, Constellation gets a X0.1 Mult for every Planet card played. I'm keen to get those multipliers stacking! Earth, which is already in my inventory, will level up Full House (Base Chips +25, Base Mult +2) and increase Constellation's multiplier (currently x1.1 to x1.2).

Since the Earth card is already in my possession, it won't cost anything. There are also two Celestial Packs in the shop for $4 each. If I had the money, these would be great for further Constellation scaling and hand level ups. But I can't afford them.

So, the optimal play here is to immediately use the Earth card. It's a no-brainer, really.

**Action: `use_consumable`**
**Consumable Position: 1 (Earth)**
**No target cards needed.**
